title: Introduction to VR-Based Science Education Design: Practical Workshop for Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of science curricula and experience in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Emphasis on smartphone-based VR experiences with a step-by-step approach for non-technical users

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more practical issues that may arise when introducing VR technology
Learners can design one science experiment simulation using smartphone-compatible VR tools
Learners can develop VR educational activity plans within budget constraints

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
